main.name: Nidhal Sghairi
main.description: I'm a full stack web developer. I have good experience in modern web technologies such as ReactJS, nodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB and GraphQL. I am also passionate about data science, machine learning and especially deep learning, worked on many topics like computer vision, classification and regression. During my last 10 months in Goshaba, I learned a lot about the SCRUM method
main.bio: I'm 24 years old, I obtained my  baccalaureate degree in 2015 with honor, then I spent two years in preparatory classes. In 2017 I entered the National School of Computer Science of Tunisia and in september 2020 I obtained my diploma of computer science engineering. Currently I am a full stack web developer at Goshaba in Paris.My main characteristics are autonomy and my ability to manage deadlines and to learn quickly.

resume.skillmessage: Check out some of my main skills

education.description: NSCS is ranked number one in computing in North Africa. At NSCS I learned to think as an engineer, I learned a lot about data structure, programming, algorithmics and complexity .I also gained a solid background in embedded systems,local networks and operating systems.

education.school: Preparatory Institute for Engineering Studies of Tunis
education.description: During these two years of preparatory classes, I acquired a solid background in mathematics and a good reasoning ability.

work.title: Full Stack Web Developer
work.description: At Goshaba we develop cognitive games to help companies in the hiring process. Using cognitive games, companies can pre-select and identify the best profiles before making interviews. Our stack is ReactJS, NodeJs , MongoDb , ExpressJS and Graphql. We work with the Scrum Method.

work.title: Summer Internship
work.description: Our project aims to develop a chatbot that helps human resources in the recruitment process. Candidates can apply for a job or get information about the company by simply talking to the chatbot.

work.title: Summer Internship
work.description: this was my first internship so i learned how the works take places in big company.I also improved my skills in Python.

projects.title: Traffic Sign Detection and Recognition
projects.category: Computer Vision,Deep Learning, Machine Learning, OpenCv

projects.title: Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter tuning, Regularization and Optimization

testimonials.text: J’ai embauché Nidhal en stage de fin d’étude pendant 6 mois puis en CDI pendant 4 mois. Suite au Covid nous n’avons malheureusement pas pu faire suite à son contrat. Cependant, Nidhal a de nombreuses qualités, il est sérieux et travailleur. Il a rapidement appris à maîtriser nos technologies (React, Node, Mongo), et s’est très bien intégré à l’équipe malgré les contraintes du confinement. Il est autonome et fiable dans son travail, désireux d’apprendre et de progresser et il a un fort potentiel de progression.
testimonials.user: Phan Minh. Co CEO de Goshaba
